front.description: A sales postcard from the restaurant chain Gourmet Burger Kitchen, describing their "Oh my Gosht!" Indian themed lamb burgers.

back.description: A mostly pre-printed postcard back asking for feedback from customers who've visited GBK. Tucked into the corner, tiny next to a large sign stating "Make some noise" and "We're hungry for your feedback", is a three-word, angled, and handwritten sentence: "Shut up, JP."
